text: Stendal () is a district (Kreis) in the north-east of Saxony-Anhalt, Germany. It was formed in 1994 by joining the old district of Stendal with the districts Osterburg and Havelberg. ==Partnerships== The districts has twin town agreements with , Yarzevo District , Mažeikiai district , Vårgårda , , Lippe == Coat of arms == The red eagle in the left of the coat of arms is the symbol of Brandenburg, as historically the Altmark was part of Brandenburg. It also stands for the district Havelland. The golden trefoil with three oak leaves symbolizes the old district of Stendal, and is taken from the coat of arms of the family of Bismarck. The three golden diamonds on black ground come from the coat of arms of the dukes of Osterburg, representing the former district Osterburg. ==Towns and municipalities== Free towns # Havelberg Verwaltungsgemeinschaften Verwaltungsgemeinschaften Verwaltungsgemeinschaften * Arneburg-Goldbeck # Altenzaun # Arneburg2 # Baben # Beelitz # Behrendorf # Bertkow # Eichstedt # Goldbeck1 # Hassel # Hohenberg-Krusemark # Iden # Klein Schwechten # Lindtorf # Rochau # Sandauerholz # Sanne # Schwarzholz # Werben2 * Bismark/Kläden # Badingen # Berkau # Bismark2 # Büste # Dobberkau # Garlipp # Grassau # Hohenwulsch # Holzhausen # Käthen # Kläden1 # Könnigde # Kremkau # Meßdorf # Querstedt # Schäplitz # Schernikau # Schinne # Schorstedt # Steinfeld * Elbe-Havel-Land # Fischbeck # Hohengöhren # Kamern # Klietz # Neuermark-Lübars # Sandau2 # Schönfeld # Schönhausen1 # Schollene # Wulkau # Wust * Osterburg # Ballerstedt # Düsedau # Erxleben # Flessau # Gladigau # Hindenburg # Königsmark # Krevese # Meseberg # Osterburg1, 2 # Rossau # Walsleben * Seehausen # Aulosen # Beuster # Boock # Bretsch # Falkenberg # Gagel # Geestgottberg # Gollensdorf # Groß Garz # Heiligenfelde # Kossebau # Krüden # Lichterfelde # Losenrade # Losse # Lückstedt # Neukirchen # Pollitz # Schönberg # Seehausen1, 2 # Wahrenberg # Wanzer # Wendemark * Stendal-Uchtetal # Buchholz # Dahlen # Groß Schwechten # Heeren # Insel # Möringen # Nahrstedt # Staats # Stendal1, 2 # Uchtspringe # Uenglingen # Vinzelberg # Volgfelde # Wittenmoor * Tangerhütte-Land # Bellingen # Birkholz # Bittkau # Cobbel # Demker # Grieben # Hüselitz # Jerchel # Kehnert # Lüderitz # Ringfurth # Schelldorf # Schernebeck # Schönwalde # Tangerhütte1, 2 # Uchtdorf # Uetz # Weißewarte # Windberge * Tangermünde # Bölsdorf # Buch # Grobleben # Hämerten # Langensalzwedel # Miltern # Storkau # Tangermünde1, 2 1seat of the Verwaltungsgemeinschaft;
